entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Span.GestureRecognizers - TapGestureRecognizer not working on windows and Android in Visual Studio 2022 .NET Maui #6257
  • Image from byte[] source doesn't work on Android #6256
  • MAUI app template will not build due to LibZipSharp error VS Community 2022 Preview 3 #6254
  • [Android] CheckBox styles not changing with AppThemeBinding #6253
    6.0.300
  • [Spike] Audit Picker accessibility and focusable behavior #6252
    6.0.300-servicing
  • VSM currently doesn't undo correctly when using `AppThemeBinding` #6251
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • [Android] IsReadOnly=true EditText controls are not focusable #6250
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Blazor Hybrid index.html script and css files are case sensitive #6248
  • CollectionView Header overlapped with EmptyView #6247
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Shell AppThemeBinding is incorrect and not consistent #6244
    6.0.300
  • Shell FlyoutItem Icon doesn't render first time #6243
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Frame/Border/Shadow should have Elevation property #6233
  • StreamImageSource doesn't work on Image Control #6231
  • Embedded images not render in Android Maui #6228
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • RadioButton preselection in xaml with multiple RadioButtonGroups not working #6227
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • [Bug] .NET MAUI RC1 - Shell - OnDisappearing not executing and OnAppearing is only executed the first time #6226
  • Http Client Maui Blazor #6219
  • add documentation for taking VS-generated default Maui project nad debugging with local Maui build #6218
  • Voiceover is not announcing the current count when we double tap on "click me" button. #6216
  • Voiceover is not reading the button for "click me" button. #6215
  • Modal pages in Android overlaps Android status bar #6214
  • New Page Feature in Visual Studio need update #6213
  • Multi-Window in Windows with all options #6210

Closed

  • [Bug] FlyoutPage does not render Flyout #2422
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • [Bug][Android] IllegalStateException on Navigation.PopAsync() #3338
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Grid width stretches off the page #4142
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • VerticalStackLayout doesn't update childs width #6235
  • MAUI RC1 is not compatible with Xamarin.iOS NuGet packages #6221
  • New Item Template for XAML ContentView creates a Resource Dictionary #6125
  • Mixing Shell and Push/Pop Navigation Sometime Fails #5965
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • [Bug][Shell][Windows] BackButton is not available/shown #5714
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • ListView context menu is not working. #6225
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • FlyoutBackgroundColor and FlyoutBackground on Windows are not working #4266
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • [Android]RTL flow direction not working for image #4743
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • StackLayout.IsEnabled = FALSE does not Disable the Child Components within it #6008
  • Release Candidate 1 Doesn't work on macOS or iOS #6082
  • sqlite path null #6145
  • EF Core migration does not work for IOS #6189
  • [Bug] Unexpected layout with Grid #2107
    6.0.300-rc.2

PullRequests

Created

  • Spike adding implictor styles to handle null colors #6255
  • [Android] SelectableItemsViewAdapter: update SelectableViewHolder on selection changes #6249
  • Remove interfering keyboard focus logic #6246
  • Remove nuspec for old stuff #6245
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Cleanup code format #6242
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Let's see if we can make these tests stable #6241
  • Handle CA1416 violations found in MAUI repo #6237
  • [Housekeeping | Windows] Revert changes in Button focus default behavior #6234
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎, control-button
  • [ci] Remove pool demands for device tests #6224
    do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Windows] Fix crash using SwipeView inside CollectionView #6220
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/SwipeView

Merged

  • fix width constraint when measuring stacklayout children #6239
  • Swap out virtual view when navigating to new Shell Item #6109
    area/navigation 🧭, area/shell 🐢, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • [android] update AOT profiles #6238
  • [Windows] Fix ListView menu events not working #6230
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/ListView
  • [ci] Add dependabot #6236
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Add single target build ProjectCapability #4791
    area/single project ☝️, partner, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • Support dotnet build with UseMauiCore #6186
    area/single project ☝️, platform/windows 🪟, p/0, fatal, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • Use infinity for measure constraints when determining auto sizes #6217
    area/layout 🔲
  • Improved Shell benchmark #6167
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/perf 🏎️

Updated

  • Fix violations of Platform Compatibility Analyzer CA1416 #5650
    area/architecture
  • Move Handler?.UpdateValue after PropertyChanged events #5980
    area/controls 🎮
  • Make Android sizing of ShapeViews consistent with iOS and Windows #6206
    t/bug, area/layout 🔲, area/drawing ✏️
  • Rendering Shapes without explicit bounds. #5817
    area/drawing ✏️
  • Fix Timing #6197
    area/shell 🐢
